summary: I love Sansa Stark so much for knowing her worth in 7x01 and 7x02, critiquing Jons actions and speaking her mind! As an abuse...
body: I love Sansa Stark so much for knowing her worth in 7x01 and 7x02, critiquing Jons actions and speaking her mind! As an abuse survivor that must have been really hard for her. What an icon.

summary: Donald Trump ha citato "Game of Thrones", HBO non ha gradito | Flashes - Il Post
title: Donald Trump ha citato "Game of Thrones", HBO non ha gradito | Flashes - Il Post
excerpt: Il presidente degli Stati Uniti Donald Trump ha citato Game of Thrones
description: Il presidente degli Stati Uniti Donald Trump ha citato Game of Thrones per celebrare il fatto che dal 6 novembre entreranno di nuovo in vigore le sanzioni degli Stati Uniti verso l’Iran, che erano state tolte nel 2015 grazie all’accordo sul nucleare iraniano firmato anche da Barack Obama. Nel tweet, scritto quando in Italia era il pomeriggio del 2 novembre, si vede una foto di Trump con sopra le parole “Sanctions are coming”: è una citazione del “Winter is coming” con cui in Game of Thrones si parla dell’arrivo del temuto inverno. Le parole sono tra l’altro scritte con lo stesso font e stile usati per Game of Thrones.  Il tweet di Trump non è piaciuto a diversi attori della serie (comprese Maisie Williams e Sophie Turner) e nemmeno a HBO, il canale che produce e trasmette Game of Thrones. HBO ha detto di non essere stata informata della cosa e che gradirebbe che la serie non venisse usata per fini politici. In un tweet ha poi scritto, citando una delle lingue parlate dai personaggi della serie: «Come si dice, in Dothraki, uso improprio di un marchio registrato?».

Le parole sono tra l’altro scritte con lo stesso font e stile usati per Game of Thrones.  Il tweet di Trump non è piaciuto a diversi attori della serie (comprese Maisie Williams e Sophie Turner) e nemmeno a HBO, il canale che produce e trasmette Game of Thrones. HBO ha detto di non essere stata informata della cosa e che gradirebbe che la serie non venisse usata per fini politici. In un tweet ha poi scritto, citando una delle lingue parlate dai personaggi della serie: «Come si dice, in Dothraki, uso improprio di un marchio registrato?».

Le parole sono tra l’altro scritte con lo stesso font e stile usati per Game of Thrones.  Il tweet di Trump non è piaciuto a diversi attori della serie (comprese Maisie Williams e Sophie Turner) e nemmeno a HBO, il canale che produce e trasmette Game of Thrones. HBO ha detto di non essere stata informata della cosa e che gradirebbe che la serie non venisse usata per fini politici. In un tweet ha poi scritto, citando una delle lingue parlate dai personaggi della serie: «Come si dice, in Dothraki, uso improprio di un marchio registrato?».

Nel tweet, scritto quando in Italia era il pomeriggio del 2 novembre, si vede una foto di Trump con sopra le parole “Sanctions are coming”: è una citazione del “Winter is coming” con cui in Game of Thrones si parla dell’arrivo del temuto inverno. summary: Game of Thrones || A Song of Ice and Fire (Jon & Daenerys)
title: Game of Thrones || A Song of Ice and Fire (Jon & Daenerys)
excerpt: Fandom: Game of thrones , Jon snow and daenerys targaryen music : Zack Hemsey - The Way (Instrumental) Enjoy "Copyright Disclaimer Under Section 107 of the C...
description:
During years  ‘’Game  Of Thrones ‘’ show runners made a couple who never ever met each other but they have the most greatest chemistry and foreshadow.  there is someone who thinks that they worked during years without reason? their every scene,every moment,every action is inspiration of each other.

It’s fact . if you aren’s blind

summary: I can’t get over how emotional this scene is - his lips are genuinely trembling and his eyes are so full of despair... He wants...
caption: I can’t get over how emotional this scene is - his lips are genuinely trembling and his eyes are so full of despair… He wants to die, and he wants her to do it, as he thinks he truly deserves it… All the anger and bravado and goading are gone, and only desperation remains…and he needs her to do it…

reblog.comment: I can’t get over how emotional this scene is - his lips are genuinely trembling and his eyes are so full of despair… He wants to die, and he wants her to do it, as he thinks he truly deserves it… All the anger and bravado and goading are gone, and only desperation remains…and he needs her to do it…

trail.content_raw: I can’t get over how emotional this scene is - his lips are genuinely trembling and his eyes are so full of despair… He wants to die, and he wants her to do it, as he thinks he truly deserves it… All the anger and bravado and goading are gone, and only desperation remains…and he needs her to do it…
trail.content: I can’t get over how emotional this scene is - his lips are genuinely trembling and his eyes are so full of despair… He wants to die, and he wants her to do it, as he thinks he truly deserves it… All the anger and bravado and goading are gone, and only desperation remains…and he needs her to do it…

summary: Donald Trump Posts ‘Game Of Thrones’ Meme To Celebrate Sanctions! – Perez Hilton
title: Donald Trump Posts ‘Game Of Thrones’ Meme To Celebrate Sanctions! – Perez Hilton
body:
UPDATE 5:25 P.M. EST: HBO has now officially responded to Trump’s use of a Game Of Thrones meme. And they’ve responded with sass:

How do you say trademark misuse in Dothraki?

— HBO (@HBO)

But Trump hated that. Anything that looks like the world coming together peacefully, anything that looks like compromise. He hates that stuff.

So he withdrew the U.S. from the Iran nuclear deal. And now the sanctions are returning. (Find more on all that HERE!)

How did Cadet Bone Spurs announce this big step back on the world’s stage? WITH A GAME OF THRONES MEME!

pic.twitter.com/nk2vKvHuaL

— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) November 2, 2018

WTF?

A meme?? About delicate foreign policy?? Come on!

This is the PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES, not your dumbass father-in-law who barely knows anything about politics except what Fox News makes him angry about!

Well, unless you’re Jared Kushner, we guess. Then he’s both.

Anyway, here are some of the best responses to Crooked Donald’s poorly thought out Twitter move:

this is not a promo for a movie. children will die from lack of medicine. ordinary people will suffer. all because you promised to leave @theIrandeal .

— Barbara Slavin (@barbaraslavin1) November 2, 2018

Sometimes it feels like the US elected a reality tv personality as its chief executive.

— Daniel Johnson voted by mail (@DanJohnsoninc) November 2, 2018

MIKE PENCE, literally yesterday: this ain’t hollywood

DONALD TRUMP, today: pic.twitter.com/uHCoOJn5Wi

— shayna smash (@shaynasmash) November 2, 2018

This is possibly the dumbest thing I have ever seen.
This is peak Trump.
I can’t believe he actually tweeted this out.

Bitch, indictments are coming. pic.twitter.com/uuhOuDmQZT

— Holly Fιɢυeroα O'Reιlly (@AynRandPaulRyan) November 2, 2018

Prison is coming. https://t.co/4Ho39Mv9Ic

— Steve Silberman (@stevesilberman) November 2, 2018

pic.twitter.com/bztO1BoObS

— darth™ (@darth) November 2, 2018

Yep. pic.twitter.com/UmbBmltvUb

— Sandwench ☕️📚🐚 (@crinolinedream) November 2, 2018

We are wearing blue today. pic.twitter.com/rP2R65DoCI

— Mitaly (@Mitaly16) November 2, 2018

[Image via CBS/WENN/Game Of Thrones/YouTube.]

Read more: https://perezhilton.com/2018-11-02-donald-trump-game-of-thrones-meme/

The post Donald Trump Posts ‘Game Of Thrones’ Meme To Celebrate Sanctions! – Perez Hilton appeared first on Viral TV News.

summary: Sky Atlantic’s Game of Thrones: Greatest Moments (2018)  01. Battle of the Bastards (S6, Ep.9) “You’re right. There’s no need...
caption:
Sky Atlantic’s Game of Thrones: Greatest Moments (2018)

01. Battle of the Bastards (S6, Ep.9)

“You’re right. There’s no need for a battle. Thousands of men don’t need to die. Only one of us. Let’s end this the old way. You against me.”

- Jon Snow

body:
Fantasy for All?

Ok guys.


Got into it with someone online who argues there shouldn’t be people of color in either the Hobbit or Game of Thrones. Sent him endless links to characters from Game of Thrones AND the interview from GRRM on the subject. I have to say, I came to the world of fantasy and sci-fi to escape bigotry and sexism but I feel like that’s all I ever get these days. :(


If you can believe in a fire-breathing dragon, why the hell does a little melanin bother you? Sad that our fandoms are becoming less inclusive and losing their ability to be fun and engaging. **goes into corner and cries a little…**
